hero.title: Transforming Businesses Through Technology
hero.description: We are a leading IT solutions provider in Indonesia, specializing in custom software development, AI implementation, and digital transformation. Our mission is to empower businesses with innovative technology solutions.

story.subtitle: Our Story
story.title: Who We Are
story.paragraph1: CV Autobot Wijaya Solution is a technology company providing comprehensive IT solutions including software development, AI implementation, IoT solutions, and IT manpower services.
story.paragraph2: We combine technical expertise with deep business understanding to deliver solutions that truly make a difference. Our team of certified professionals has successfully delivered 150+ projects across 12+ different industries.
story.paragraph3: From startups to enterprises, schools to hospitals, we've helped organizations embrace digital transformation and achieve their business goals through technology.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the most trusted technology partner in Indonesia, empowering businesses to thrive in the digital age through innovative and sustainable solutions.

mission.title: Our Mission
items: Deliver world-class IT solutions tailored to Indonesian businesses
Foster innovation through continuous learning and R&D
Build long-term partnerships based on trust and results
Contribute to Indonesia's digital economy growth

values.subtitle: Our Values
values.title: What Drives Us
values.description: Our core values guide everything we do and help us deliver exceptional results.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every project we deliver, ensuring the highest quality standards.

clientCentric.title: Client-Centric
clientCentric.description: Our clients' success is our success. We build lasting partnerships based on trust and results.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new technologies and methodologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We operate with honesty, transparency, and ethical practices in all our dealings.

milestones.subtitle: Our Journey
milestones.title: Key Milestones
milestones.description: From our humble beginnings to becoming a trusted technology partner.

items.description: Established with a vision to transform businesses through automation and AI integration.

Started partnerships with corporate clients for financial automation systems. Developed academic management systems for education sector. Implemented OCR technology for bank reconciliation automation.

Secured 5-year contract worth 1+ billion rupiah. Financial automation system successfully reduced reconciliation time from 14 days to 2 days with 80% cost savings. 50+ projects successfully completed. Development of various SaaS systems and IoT solutions.
Focus on developing advanced AI and automation solutions. Expansion of IoT product portfolio.
Building strategic partnerships for business expansion. Product development in preparation for 2026 launch.
Launch of innovative products developed in 2025.
